data.name: Sonic Frontiers
data.detailed_description: Worlds will collide in Sonic the Hedgehog’s newest adventure. An experience like never before, accelerate to new heights and experience the thrill of high velocity open-zone freedom. Battle powerful enemies as you speed through the Starfall Islands - landscapes brimming with dense forests, overflowing waterfalls, sizzling deserts and more! ! This Holiday 2022 - Journey into new realms.
data.about_the_game: Worlds will collide in Sonic the Hedgehog’s newest adventure. An experience like never before, accelerate to new heights and experience the thrill of high velocity open-zone freedom. Battle powerful enemies as you speed through the Starfall Islands - landscapes brimming with dense forests, overflowing waterfalls, sizzling deserts and more! ! This Holiday 2022 - Journey into new realms.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Portuguese - Brazil, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*, Korean
*languages with full audio support
